com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.domainrep.rdm.directory

Class Service.ServiceLink

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.domainrep.rdm.directory.Service.ServiceLink
  • Enclosing interface:
    Service

    public static class Service.ServiceLink
extends java.lang.Object
    The RDM Service Link. Contains information about an upstream source associated with the service.
    See Also:
    Service.ServiceLinkFlags, ServiceImpl

        public void name(com.thomsonreuters.upa.codec.Buffer name)

      • checkHasText

        public boolean checkHasText()
        Indicates presence of the link text field. Flags may also be bulk-get via flags().
        Returns:
        true - if text field is present, false - if not.
